mapper.select: SELECT rnum, rno, btitle, rcontent, memail, bno, rdate FROM (SELECT rownum as rnum, rno, btitle, rcontent, memail, bno, rdate FROM (SELECT rno, btitle, rcontent, r.memail, r.bno, rdate FROM board b, reply r WHERE r.bno = b.cno ORDER BY rdate DESC) WHERE rownum <=#{endRowNo}) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}
